DOC.criteria: Male Female , > = 18 year age Subject previously diagnose ( prior Baseline Visit ) mild severe dry eye disease ( ITF level 1 , 2 3 ) require continuous medical therapy Restasis® minimum duration 6 month postBaseline ( Visit 1 ) ; Subject newly diagnose ( Baseline Visit ) mild severe dry eye disease ( ITF level 1 , 2 3 ) require continuous medical therapy Restasis® minimum duration 6 month postBaseline ( Visit 1 ) ; Subject prescribe Restasis® therapy Baseline Visit ( Visit 1 ) commence dose immediately Baseline Visit ( Visit 1 ) Baseline Visit occur 01 July 2012 01 January 2014 ; Subject corneal stain least one dry eye sign ( i.e. , Schirmer 's Test score < 10 mm , decrease tear lake , TBUT < 10 second , conjunctival staining , tear osmolarity > 310 mOsmol/L Subject chart tolerability efficacy data reflect least one followup visit follow Restasis® treatment initiation ; Subject wear contact lens ( e ) concurrently receive Restasis® treatment minimum duration 6 month postBaseline ( Visit 1 )
